info.title: CodeIgniter 4 API Starter
info.description: RESTful API built with CodeIgniter 4, featuring JWT authentication, standardized responses, and comprehensive documentation.

post.description: Creates a new API key. The full raw key is returned only once in this response and cannot be retrieved again.

201.description: API key created — raw key included once

get.summary: Get audit logs for an entity

202.description: Google login received, account pending admin approval

post.description: Always returns a generic success response for valid emails. For soft-deleted accounts, this may trigger a reactivation request that requires admin approval.

client_base_url.description: Optional client app base URL used to build reset link

200.description: Generic success response (reset queued or reactivation requested)

post.summary: Revoke all tokens for current user

client_base_url.description: Optional client app base URL used to build verification link

200.description: File metadata (or file download for local storage)

get.description: Lists users except accounts with role superadmin.

post.description: Admins can create only role=user. Creating admin/superadmin requires superadmin.

put.description: Admins can only update users with role=user and cannot promote to admin/superadmin.

delete.description: Admins can delete only users with role=user.

ApiKey.title: ApiKey
ApiKey.description: API key object. The raw key value is only returned once at creation.

name.description: Human-readable label for the API key

key_prefix.description: First 12 characters of the raw key (safe to display)

key.description: Full raw API key — only present in the creation response

is_active.description: Whether the key is currently active

rate_limit_requests.description: Maximum requests per window (global key budget)

user_rate_limit.description: Per-user request limit within the window when JWT is present

ip_rate_limit.description: Per-IP defensive limit within the window when no JWT is present

AuthToken.title: Authentication Token
AuthToken.description: JWT token with associated user data
